column4: apt-get update spits out a bunch of 403 Forbidden errors.  Are the Dapper repositories down (sorry, I said breezy a moment ago)?

apt-get update spits out a bunch of 403 Forbidden errors.  Are the Dapper repositories down?
if nobody can answer my question here, can somebody please direct me to where I CAN get a response?
ubuntuforms won't give me up-to-date info

the only logical explination is that the repositories are down, can somebody confirm this?

the repos are working fine for me
how can I specify a different mirror?  I've been searching google and ubuntuforms for that without any luck
you have to manually edit your sources.list
where can I find a list of mirrors?
that's the same one I'm using. some of them work, others do not
